title: 2 Bed (1 Bed SPLIT) Laundry in Building - Heat/Hot Water INCLUDED
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 41322512', 'Rent: $2,250 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', '1 Bedroom SPLIT style unit that can be used as a 2 Bedroom with no formal living room to keep costs low!', '2nd Floor - Bright and sunny.. IDEAL LOCATION on Commonwealth Ave near Harvard Ave - Easy access to schools and hospitals (BU, BC, MIT, Harvard, Northeastern) Heat and Hot Water Included, Laundry in Building.', 'Professionally Managed with Elevator access.', 'Contact Chris to schedule your showings..', 'For inquiries..', 'Please email Chris with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!', 'ChrisP @ <URL>          860 - 309 - 8511', 'Bus: 65 Washington St opp Euston Rd (0.31 mi)', 'Bus: 57 Cambridge St @ Saunders St (0.31 mi)', 'Tram: B Warren Street (0.04 mi)', 'Bus: 64 N Beacon St @ Cambridge St (0.41 mi)', 'Bus: 66 Brighton Ave @ Cambridge St (0.42 mi)', '41322512', 'FEATURES', 'Elevator', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Heat and Hot Water Included', 'Pet Friendly', 'T Accessible', 'Christopher Puzacke', 'Licensed Real Estate Professional', '107 Brighton Ave Boston, MA 02134', 'Cell: 860.309.8511', 'Click here to search all of our available apartments!', '<URL>/', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
